summary: An orchestra assmbles for a rehearsal in an ancient chapel under the inquisive eyes of a TV documentary crew, but an uprising breaks out.
cast: Balduin Baas|Clara Colosimo|Elizabeth Labi|Ronaldo Bonacchi|Ferdinando Villella|Franco Javarone|David Maunsell|Francesco Aluigi|Andy Miller|Sibyl Mostert|Franco Mazzieri|Daniele Pagani|Luigi Uzzo|Cesare Martignon|Umberto Zuanelli|Filippo Trincaia|Claudio Ciocca|Angelica Hansen|Heinz Kreuger|Christian Borromeo|Paolo Fiorino|Franco Trevisi|Adelaide Aste|Pierluigi Calderoni|Rodolfo Maltese
title: Ensayo de orquesta
